评论概述: If you don't have curves this is an extremely unflattering dress
评论详情: Runs incredibly small/tight, I ordered a 2xl and it made me look pregnant. I also have a box shape rather than an hour glass I thought there would be some wiggle room and I couldn't hardly breathe in the dress. I also have a small butt and it doesn't look good in that area either. It's a body con dress, a very specific body type can pull these off and it's not my body type lol. Cute for a small waist big booty type, also the breast part is extremely small.
Dress for like a glove. My sister stole it and now I have to get a new one
Cute and comfortable for halloween. I added a witch's hat and it was a cute costume that I could wear at bars.

Very very tight and I sized up. I can barely wear it. But with some suck um ups and a long cardigan and high waisted belt, fishnets in a dark club...I look smoking hot. It really is great quality though. Lol

Got this Gothic mini dress for my wife I got the 3x size because she five eight tall and weights 212 pounds this fit her perfectly and she loved she also liked the fact it was red and velvet and had black lace with it good value for the money and quality of dress is good and fast shipping.
Super cute dress with the softest fabric. As a woman with DDs, this dress was really revealing in that area which I love but do be warned, y'all!

评论概述: From a man's point of view
评论详情: Not used to women's sizes I guess but for someone who floats in a normal 3x the 3x was more like a tight shirt. Felt like a xl.  Super sweat absorbent though and showed all my curves whether I wanted them to or not. Worked for my trashy Courtney Love costume. Definitely not gonna wear it again though 😂

评论概述: Couldn't even fit this over my chest
评论详情: I guess I needed to look at the size chart. I am 5'9" and I wear a 1X and the 2X and 3X of this were the same tiny size ( upsized just in case). Asinine sizing, don't say it's plus if it CLEARLY is not.
This fit very well so I’m glad i sized up. I’m tall and it wasn’t too short. It’s a very flattering fit. I also ordered one size smaller just in case but this one looks much better on

Omg this dress is soooo cute! And actually not as short as I thought it would be! The cross has a little Jesus on it that idk how I feel about..like I know it's a sexy goth dress but the Jesus on the cross feels a little too blasphemous. Idk.. but the dress is incredibly sexy and hugs my curves perfectly. I'm 5'3 about 160 and a large fit like a glove.

评论概述: 5’1, 130lbs, usually wear S/M, got a small
评论详情: i’m 5’1, 130lbs got a size S. it’s a little long on me bc i’m short so i scrunch it up a bit. love the velvet feel and it’s pretty stretchy. the lace is pretty cheap looking fyi but i still get compliments on this dress all the time.  btw i bought this same exact dress on yesstyle a while ago for like $10 but i lost it and needed another asap for a date. if u don’t care about waiting for shipping i would just look for it on other dropship sites
Looks and fits amazing!

评论概述: NOT TRUE TO SIZE AT ALL
评论详情: I ordered a 3x to be safe on size. And when I bought it, it started to fit fine until I got to my chest. If you have small tits you’ll be fine but if you have a bigger chest I highly recommend going up 2 more sizes. It’s so cute and I’m so disappointed. Returning as soon as possible. 🥲
Well, this dress is way longer than expected and the size I ordered is definitely not true to fit. No, I will not order it again nor will I recommend it to anyone

I am 5'2" & 100-105lbs. I had the same one in black, so I decided to get it in red. I love the velvet. Very soft & stretchy. Super comfortable. The dress does not fit perfectly to my body right out the packaging. It's a too loose too look the way it does in the photo & the curves aren't perfectly aligned for my shape. Buy I'm a seamstress so I adjust it.(I have to do this with most clothes.) I love the look of the dress. & if I had a need to, I'd buy the black/red again.

评论概述: A bit see-through, but stretchy and soft
评论详情: Way more forgiving of a fabric than I thought, but it’s a bit too transparent for me, might have to sew a slip fabric on it. Which is a shame because I quite enjoyed how breathable the fabric is. I’m also not sure how I feel about the crucifix between the boobs, Jesus shouldn’t be with me at the club like THAT!! Other than that super cute and comfy, definitely worth the buy otherwise.
I love this dress, very soft material, good quality and fits me nicely. It looks great
Loveeee this dress
Such a good find for how little you pay. It’s comfortable and sleek fitting. You can easily remove the silver charm and use it for a party or dinner, or keep it and use it for a costume.

Oh wow I haven't been having luck with clothes on Amazon lately but THIS ONE! THIS ONE fits absolutely perfect! A curve hugger for sure & the dress has a nice slight stretch to it so it's more accommodating. It's absolutely beautiful & sexy & I highly recommend getting it!

So, I actually really like that appearance of the dress and it’s actually a nice length, from reading other reviews I’d thought it be much shorter. It’s made of valor fabric and it was as expected the only problem for me is it clings to my middle and with a pair of fishnets you can see it through the pink. May order in black if you have boobs larger that a c it doesn’t seem like it would fit to well cup wise. The dress was reasonably priced and I love the cross decorations. Unfortunately I didn’t feel comfortable in it so it’s going back.
It was really cute, flattering! Fit like expected.
It fits the way it should and like it a lot.  Texture isn't my favorite but I  have problems with a lot of textures
Hugs perfectly and looks beautiful. Buy it

Surprisingly a nicely made dress for the price! I ordered a size large and was a little worried as I normally wear xl, but it is stretchy! That being said it definitely hugged every curve. So to help I just wore a comfy body shaper underneath. For reference I'm 165lbs, 5'5", and a 38D. Will say that it was a bit small I'm the boob area.
Good quality looks great on and is very comfortable 10 out of 10
Wore it to a dance, got in trouble for showing ass‼️ if you’re not that typa girl don’t buy but i loved it
Pretty, fits well! I COULD have gotten a size up though! I love the look of it and it honestly is really cute.

Loved this dress and so did my Guy!! Great material, slightly stretchy, and hugs your curves. Because the dress is very form fitting I had to go up one size, so please keep that in mind. I highly recommend this dress if your looking for a sexy dress for a night out.
It is super cute and the fabric is soft and comfortable!! I loved the cross but it fell off in the washer :( possibly my fault tho. It fit wonderfully and went with my aesthetic well

bought this for a trip to Salem. Wasn't sure how I would like it with my body type but I loveddddd it and it was soooo comfy. def a form fitting dress but long enough to where I was comfortable to walk around all day.  I am 5'4 197lbs and ordered a XL. I did wear tights for compression and sculpting but other than that it def fit exactly how I wanted
My daughter loves everything about this dress. She said it’s her new favorite dress ever. It fits well and is comfy
i gave this as a gift and i think they liked it

I typically wear2x, purchased this in 5x as recommended to 'size up.' Well, if what I received is a 5x, I'm married to the Pope. As a plus-size woman who likes to look nice, I take offense at the completely misleading descriptions that often accompany these items. Lesson learned.
It’s so pretty and fits nice and snug. Keep in mind the cross’s Jesus is extremely detailed.

I bought this last minute for a disturbed concert. Let me tell you- it was so comfortable due to a stretchy spandex like material and so damn cute on. Highly recommend! I am 160lbs 36D, 36in waist, and 41in hips and got the XL. It was super perfect and with stretch so it was comfortable when I danced and when I sat down during the concert. Paired it with a faux leather jacket and my docs. Thanks Amazon!

评论概述: Wore this to my Ghost concert
评论详情: I had my Mom remove the crucifix and sew on the Ghost insignia instead. The dress is really soft and takes the shape of your body. Looks good on any body type, big or small. Got tons of compliments at the show.
I ended up taking off the cross on it but I wore it out and about and I got a bunch of compliments! I love how it looks on me 😁
The cup size is ridiculously small & the 2XL fit like a Large. Was supposed to wear this for my anniversary & now I have nothing to wear because it was so tiny.
Absolutely perfect. Stretchy, beautiful, form fitting and amazing fabric!

Bought this in red and black and they are fabulous. Very flattering on my figure. The xxl fits perfect. My measurements are 44-36-49 size 38d bra. 220 lbs.  Shipped in a timely fashion and I will buy from this seller again. I wish they would get more xxl styles in.

评论用户: Love it! Much better quality than expected and true to size.
评论详情: Looove the dress! Way better quality than I expected and it fits so good! True to size, I ordered a large.

I got a medium. I’m 5”4 and 120 lbs. I have wider hips and feared that the size small would end up being too short so I sized up to a medium. It’s perfect and entirely comfortable. Dress doesn’t ride up so there’s no need to constantly pull it down. I have a smaller chest so I had to wear a padded bra but the dress even hid the bra well.
I’m not large in the chest (38C) so this dress was perfect for me but if you’re top heavy it may be an issue. Otherwise it’s very cute, soft, and seems well put together 👍🏻
The material is lovely and soft. It stretches a bit so I would go down a size, which I'm glad I did. Also, be careful it rises when you walk.

Chest area is way too small. Stomach area was very loose!  I'm 5'5 203lbs 36DD cup size. I normally wear size US 14. This was NOT a good fit.  The quality is great though and the cross on the dress is made from metal that feels high quality.

Super cute dress, it’s a velvet fabric and is very soft. I’m 5’10 so the dress is pretty short on me and I have to constantly pull it down so my butt doesn’t show. It’s a bit stretchy which is nice. Iv had this for about a year and still one of my favorites
I wore this on a first date and it was a total hit. Easy to take off and accentuates curves.

This was for my daughter.  She's 14 and she's 180lbs 5.8H.  Its a flattering dress.  She is a little larger on top and I wish it would have covered a little more.  But its fine.  Velvet is soft, lace around it is pretty. This washes is good in delicate.  She bought another dress like this but it flares out at the bottom and it washed nicely just hang dry.

I love the velvet material, i was nervous about the black outerlining but it didnt cause any itchiness or discomfort. It fits my curves very well. I have an A cup so its hard to fit dresses on my chest but the material didnt make my chest look deflated or awkward!! Please note it is extremely short! Size up if you want a longer dress definitely
just like photo, very cute
It’s really nice I still have to pull it up a lot to keep my chest covered but I  think it’s worth it
Very comfy and sexy I’m in love with dress probably buy more of this brand tbh!! 🥰🥰🥰🔥🔥🔥

I got this and several other dresses from here for a Halloween party and this one was the winner. If you’re on the busty side, you can’t wear a bra, it’s too tight on the girls. The straps are adjustable which is nice. The slit adds an element of sexy and I found it to be an appropriate length. Not too much stretch in the dress in my opinion. I am 5’9,140 lbs, 34 DD for reference. I ordered the medium and the large, the large I sent back because it was too big, medium fit like a glove.
This is not meant for someone with big boobs. Ordered this 2x bigger then my size & this chopped have my chest
Fits like a dream!!!
I think the dress is very pretty but I recommend you size up as it can be really close fitting.

The order came a lot sooner than it’s estimated time, which was awesome. The package was transparent and had a ziplock on the bag, which was interesting, but nothing was wrong with the dress. The fabric is extremely soft and stretchy, and it really accentuates your curves! The quality is surprisingly good seeing how a lot of clothing is cheap on Amazon. In terms of sizing, I usually wear a medium to large but I sized up, which was perfect. The straps are comfortable and don’t cut into your shoulders. The length is longer than I expected, which I’m also very happy about since I can bend down without not having to worry about being exposed. The embroidery is nice and cuts off before going under the armpit area, so no scratchy fabric! Very pleased. :)

评论概述: It runs a little small so order a size up BUT ITS SO CUTE!
评论详情: Just runs a little small bit it’s so cute! It’s also a little short. Don’t account for how wide you are just how tall.

Such a cute dress, I’m using it for a vampire costume. I was afraid the small cup wouldn’t fit my big boobs but it even though the cup is technically smaller than my boobs it doesn’t look awkward at all, it look very sexy actually. I has a nice stretch to it while keeping everything together at the same time. I am 5,2 i weigh 186lbs i got the large, I prefer my dresses more fitted. Flattering

I love it! I’m 5’8 and about 133lbs with 34DDD and I got a size Large. It fits as expected. I probably could’ve sized up for my boobs but it’ll work and the rest of the body is perfect! I find it very flattering and comfortable
It looks really pretty and it's comfortable. I recommend getting one size up.
A little smaller than I wanted. Decent quality and great stretch, but I’d definitely size up.
I’m obsessed with clothing from this company, everything is so comfortable and cute. 10/10
i absolutely love this dress, it's very flattering, and fits as expected
Highly recommend seriously love this dress

I bought this dress for an emo night out event and I love it so much!!! Great for the price, super cute and flattering. The length is perfect for me. I dont recall it rising up too much when I went out. I'm 5'2 124 pounds measurements  32in x 26in x 37in and the small was perfect. The only dislike I had was the lace trimming at the top, it would rub by my arm pit which was a tad annoying. Other than that I will be wearing this dress a lot. Get it and slay!!

I loved the pictures of this dress. I am 4'11 and 148lbs. After reading someof the reviews I ordered a large instead of a medium (which is what I normal wear). The dress was way to small, and so tight. The split came up to my hip joint. I even had to have help getting OUT of the dress. Pictured is my 7 yr daughter who is 4"1 and weighs abour 50lbs.... The oy thing positive was I loved the feel of the fabric, very soft. But Overall I was extremely disappointed 😞 😔
I felt absolutely gorgeous wearing this on my wedding day

I'm size small but this was waaaay too short! Fit almost like a shirt! Barely covered my but. No way anyone could wear this! I'm 5' 4! I'm trying to return it for a refund. It was sooo beautiful though
The dress itself is made very well considering the price, but it is faaaar too small despite being within the measurements.

Had to replace the order because the first one was sewn poorly but I'm very happy happy with the replacement, it's super cute! The small is pretty tight and I'm usually a xs-s so if you like a bit looser fitting style order a size up.
So pretty loved

Its alittle short but its so pretty and comfortable.
